name: Morality amid Monsters: Bloodstained Masquerade
description:
Morality amid Monsters: Bloodstained Masquerade is a minirpg designed for two or more players where you play as a vampire who has to prove themselves worthy of becoming the next ruler of all the vampires Houses for the next century.

This game is in active playtest as I mainly used this to take a break from my main project Masks: Duos while still thinking in a game design mindset. If you notice any ways to improve on this rpg feel free to message me on Discord: 234TheWolf#9433 or on Twitter: @234thewolf.

All donations made to this project will go towards art for this and other Cape and Cowl games.
